Package org.shared.net.filter.ssl

A package for filter-based SSL/TLS transport.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    SslEngineFactory<T extends SslEngineFactory<T>>
    Defines a configurable factory for creating SSLEngines.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    SslFilter
    An implementation of Filter that encrypts/decrypts traffic using the SSL/TLS protocol.
    SslFilterFactory
    An implementation of FilterFactory that creates SslFilters.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    SslEngineFactory.Mode
    An enumeration of SSLEngine operating modes.

Package org.shared.net.filter.ssl Description

A package for filter-based SSL/TLS transport.
